title: Can't assign command to Ctrl+Backspace
description: When attempting to assign a command to Ctrl+Backspace, the keybinding manager behaves unexpectedly.
OB: When trying to assign a command to Ctrl+Backspace, the keybinding manager displays Ctrl+Del when I press Ctrl+Backspace. It then deletes the next word. I'm using a Swiss German Keyboard with the Swiss German Locale.
EB: I expect that when I assign a command to Ctrl+Backspace, it should delete the previous word, as it should out of the box.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the keybinding manager.
2. Try to assign a command to Ctrl+Backspace.
3. Notice that the keybinding manager displays Ctrl+Del when Ctrl+Backspace is pressed.
4. Confirm that it deletes the next word instead of the previous one.
